external_references.description: Mercer, W. and Rascagneres, P. (2018, February 12). Olympic Destroyer Takes Aim At Winter Olympics. Retrieved March 14, 2019.

objects.description: [Olympic Destroyer](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0365) uses the native Windows utilities vssadmin, wbadmin, and bcdedit to delete and disable operating system recovery features such as the Windows backup catalog and Windows Automatic Repair.(Citation: Talos Olympic Destroyer 2018)
